vooga.towerdefense.util

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • vooga.towerdefense.util.Sprite
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GameElement, Tile

    public abstract class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a shape that moves on its own. Note, Sprite is a technical term: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sprite_(computer_graphics)
    Author:
    Robert C. Duvall, Leonard K. Ng'eno

      Create a shape at the given position, with the given size, velocity, and color.
